attributes.action: Allow some pubs and clubs to have 'smoking licenses'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow some pubs, clubs, etc to have a smoking license so that the smoker can enjoy a cigarette with their drink. With some caveats ie children are not allowed in the premises and food is not allowed to be bought/sold/consumed on the premises.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
